item.title: ポーランドの国営メディアをめぐる選挙後の戦い。穏健派の新政権は、強硬右派のメディア遺産を解体することを目指している。
item.description:
Jon Allsop / Columbia Journalism Review:
A look at the post-election battle over Poland's state-run media, as the new moderate government aims to dismantle the hard right party's media legacy  —  A little over a year ago, Civic Platform, then the main opposition party in Poland, proposed a bill aimed at doing away …

item.title: ディープフェイクが海外の選挙をゆがめる中、米国の州議会は、様々な罰則付きで、政治広告におけるAI使用の開示を義務付ける法律の制定を競っている（David W. Chen/New York Times）。
item.description:
David W. Chen / New York Times:
As deepfakes warp elections overseas, US state legislators race to enact laws, with varying penalties, requiring disclosure of the use of AI in political ads  —  Sophisticated political deepfakes have warped elections overseas.  Can U.S. legislators act fast enough to make A.I. campaign ads more transparent?

item.title: 多くの著名声優は、SAG-AFTRAがレプリカ・スタジオと交わした、AIが生成した声をビデオゲームで使用する方法を定めた契約について知らされていなかったと語る（Tom Gerken/BBC）
item.description:
Tom Gerken / BBC:
Many prominent voice actors say they weren't told about the SAG-AFTRA's deal with Replica Studios setting out how AI-generated voices can be used in video games  —  Prominent voice actors say they weren't told about a landmark deal setting out how voices generated by artificial intelligence (AI) can be used in games.

item.title: インサイダー・インテリジェンス米国の政治広告費は、2024年には2020年比30％増の123億2000万ドルに達する見込みで、従来型メディアが全体の71.9％を占める（Chavi Mehta/Reuters）
item.description:
Chavi Mehta / Reuters:
Insider Intelligence: US political ad spend is expected to rise to $12.32B in 2024, up ~30% from 2020, with traditional media accounting for 71.9% of all spend  —  U.S. political advertising spend will likely jump by nearly a third in 2024 over the previous U.S. presidential election year …

item.title: 情報筋チェダーニュースは細い糸でぶら下がっており、編集スタッフは2023年12月の数十人から6人ほどに減っている（Oliver Darcy/CNN）
item.description:
Oliver Darcy / CNN:
Sources: Cheddar News is hanging on by a thin thread, with no more than a half-dozen or so editorial staffers, down from a couple dozen in December 2023  —  Not too long ago, on the 25th and 26th floors of the One State Street tower in lower Manhattan, a vibrant newsroom existed.

item.title: PlatformerはSubstackを離れ、Ghostに移行する。Substackがプロ・ナチスの素材を積極的に削除することを公に約束するとは思えないからだ（Casey Newton/Platformer）
item.description:
Casey Newton / Platformer:
Platformer is leaving Substack and migrating to Ghost, saying it doesn't believe Substack will publicly commit to proactively removing pro-Nazi material  —  After much consideration, we have decided to move Platformer off of Substack.  Over the next few days, the publication will migrate …

item.title: ピーコックは1月13日、NBCUが1億ドル以上を費やしたNFLプレーオフの試合を独占的に放映する初のストリーマーとなる。
item.description:
John Koblin / New York Times:
Peacock will become the first streamer to exclusively show an NFL playoff game, which cost NBCU $100M+, on January 13; the game airs free in KC and Miami  —  The game, between the Kansas City Chiefs and Miami Dolphins, is the biggest test yet for whether live sports will find a comfortable home on streaming services.

item.title: 情報筋Pixar、従業員の最大20%をレイオフする可能性；Pixarはこの数字は高すぎるとし、レイオフは差し迫ったものではなく、2024年後半に行われるとしている（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Sources: Pixar may lay off up to 20% of its workforce; Pixar says that number is too high and that the layoffs are not imminent, but will occur later in 2024  —  Disney-owned animation studio Pixar is poised to undergo layoffs this year, TechCrunch has learned and the company confirmed.

item.title: 社内メモ：Audibleは従業員の約5％、100人強をレイオフする。情報筋によると、レイオフはAudibleのコンテンツ・チームには影響しないとのこと（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Internal memo: Audible is laying off about 5% of its employees, or just over 100 staffers; a source says the layoffs do not affect Audible's content teams  —  The cutbacks come as other Amazon groups — including Prime Video, Amazon MGM Studios and Twitch — this week are pink-slipping several hundred workers.

item.title: 情報源Oppenheimer』は2月にPeacockでストリーミング配信を開始する予定で、ユニバーサル作品としては劇場公開からストリーミングデビューまでの期間が過去最長となる（Thomas Buckley/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Buckley / Bloomberg:
Sources: Oppenheimer will start streaming on Peacock in February, the longest time ever between a theatrical opening and a streaming debut for a Universal film  —  - Golden Globe winner will be rereleased in theaters this month  — Director Nolan is a longtime advocate for cinema experience

item.title: ValueAct社によると、ディズニーへの投資計画の中心は、同社のパークがハイリターン資産であることと、ストリーミング戦争が終結するという予想だ（Michael Flaherty/Axios）
item.description:
Michael Flaherty / Axios:
ValueAct says its investment plan for Disney is centered on the company's parks being high-return assets and the expectation that the streaming wars are ending  —  ValueAct's investment plan for Disney is centered on strong cash flows from its parks and consumer products …

Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Slate acquires the Death, Sex & Money podcast from New York public radio station WNYC; the terms of the deal weren't disclosed  —  The former WNYC-produced show will offer new episodes this year  —  Slate, the online magazine and podcast publisher owned by Graham Holdings Co. …

item.title: エミー賞主催のNATASによると、ESPNは「College GameDay」のエントリーで偽名を使って30以上のエミー賞を受賞。
item.description:
Katie Strang / The Athletic:
Emmy Awards organizer NATAS says ESPN won 30+ Emmys using fake names in its “College GameDay” entries; ESPN blames “a misguided attempt” and returns the awards  —  In March 2023, Shelley Smith, who worked 26 years as an on-air reporter for ESPN, received a call from Stephanie Druley …

item.title: YouTube、Tubi、Rokuなどで配信するZ世代向けスタジオBrat TVが、ホラー映画やTVを制作するスタジオCrypt TVを買収（Valerie Complex/Deadline）
item.description:
Valerie Complex / Deadline:
Brat TV, a Gen Z studio that distributes on YouTube, Tubi, Roku, and other platforms, acquires Crypt TV, a studio that produces horror films and TV  —  EXCLUSIVE: Brat TV, the Gen Z studio behind digital series like Chicken Girls, has acquired Crypt TV, a similar company in the horror space.

item.title: Netflix、ヒンドゥー教団体から反発を受け、ヒンドゥー教徒の登場人物が肉を食べるインド映画を削除。
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
Netflix removes an Indian film depicting a Hindu character eating meat after backlash from Hindu groups; producer Zee apologizes and plans to edit the film  —  Tamil-language film “Annapoorani: The Goddess of Food,” headlined by “Jawan” actor Nayanthara, has been pulled from Netflix …
